EmailTemplate.name: New Sales Engineer Case Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: New Sales Engineer Case {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Danielle,
A new Case has been added to the Virtual Sales Engineer Queue.
Please assign this Case {!Case.CaseNumber} to one of the Sales Engineers (they can also assign them Case to themselves).
Case Subject - {!Case.Subject}
If there are any issues with this email please contact your Salesforce Administrator
